message: I think this is more fair considering the inflation we are facing. Do you agree?
Considering inflation, this is a better deal for you than my first offer.
The value of the money is decreasing rapidly. This is my final offer.
You said that was your final offer, but I think you can do better considering the inflation.
This is non-negotiable.  We need to split this evenly while it's still worthwhile for both of us.
